projects.title: A simple Medium Clone app
projects.writeUp: This is my first official app, a medium clone . i put all the major skills o had learnt at the time into practice to create a dummy replica of the original medium app

projects.title: A Ecommerce Website
projects.writeUp: This is an ecommerce website i developed for a brand in nigeria , A convinient way of buying and selling

projects.title: A weather tracking website .
projects.writeUp: The Weather website which provides a national and local weather forecast for cities, as well as weather radar, report and hurricane coverage.

projects.title: An Uber Cloone website
projects.writeUp: Uses api to keep track of ddirections using google maps. uber clone put my knowledge to test and it was a wonderful experience buiding it up.
